content: in the 2nd st slip_stitch in the 3rd st chain 3 increase two times 4 chain 2 skip chain space double_crochet across until one st left before the next chain space increase chain 2 skip chain space increase in the next 2 sts 4 continue alternating between the last two row until you have a total of 9 11 13 15 17 21 23 25 27 row and 30 34 36 40 42 48 52 54 58 sts row 10 12 14 16 18 22 24 26 28 turn slip_stitch across 3 times starting in the 2nd st slip_stitch in the next chain space slip_stitch 2 more times you should be in the second st after the first chain space chain 3 double_crochet across until one st left before the next chain space increase chain 2 skip chain space increase in the next 2 sts 4 26 30 32 36 38 44 48 50 54 row 11 13 15 17 19 23 25 27 29 turn slip_stitch in the 2nd st slip_stitch in the 3rd st chain 3 increase two times 4 chain 2 skip chain space increase in the first st after the chain space double_crochet across until 5 sts remain leave the rest of the sts unworked row 12 14 16 18 20 24 26 28 30 turn slip_stitch into the next 5 sts starting in the 2nd st chain 3 double_crochet across until one st remains before the chain space increase chain 2 skip chain space increase in the next 2 sts 4 continue alternating between the last two row until you have a total of 14 16 18 20 22 26 28 30 32 row row 15 17 19 21 23 27 29 31 33 turn slip_stitch in the 2nd st slip_stitch in the 3rd st chain 3 increase two times 4 6 butterfly top mae crochets sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x butterfly wings continued upper wing continued row 16 18 20 22 24 28 30 32 34 turn slip_stitch across 3 times starting in the 2nd st place another slip_stitch in the top of the chain 3 chain 170 190 200 220 240 260 280 300 320 this will be one of the strands that will cross in the back you can adjust the length accordingly starting in the 2nd chain from the hook slip_stitch across the chain slip_stitch in the st the chain started from f/o lower wing attach your yarn to the outer double_crochet sts in the middle 3 sts from row 6 see photo for details row 5 7 7 9 9 11 13 13 15 chain 3 place 3 double_crochet in the same st 3 chain 2 skip chain space double_crochet across
